components/f/b2b/checkout-lockdown:
{{lang 'b2b.minimum_order_message' currency=settings.money.currency_token value=theme_settings.minimum_checkout_value remaining=(toFixed (subtract theme_settings.minimum_checkout_value cart.sub_total.value) 2)}}

{{lang 'cart.continue_shopping'}}
layout/empty:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
    {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
    {{{ head.config }}}

    <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
    {{#block "head"}}{{/block}}
</head>
<body>
    {{#block "page"}}{{/block}}
</body>
</html>
